title: rAga rasAnanda nartana rAga rasAnanda
sahitya:
rAga rasAnanda nartana (anu) rAga rasAnanda nartana vraja lalanA sAmAjika brndAraka


anupallavi

  sAgarala kALIya darbaharaNa gOpi manOramaNa tAhata dInuta dhomka dhomka caritAm tAm tAm dhomkataika
sA ri ga sA ri ga ma sA pa ma pa ga ri sA sA pA pA tatana tomna tomka ga* ri ga* sa* sa* ri dhinata kujhaNa pa pA ri rI sa* sa* ; , pa pa ri ri sa sa sA sA tom nam sA ri tom nam , (sA* sA* tom nam sA* ri tom nam) tAkiTa nA kiTa taitaka tOm saridhAm (kiTataka tarikiTa) tAkiTa nA kiTatai taka tom saritAm (kiTataka karikiTa) kiTa taitaka tom saritAm tAkiTa tAkiTa jhomtari tAm tAkiTa tAkiTa jhom taka jhom taritAm (kiTataka tarikiTa kiTataka tarikiTa kiTataka tarikiTa)
			(the bracketed svaras are to be sung in 4 times the speed)


caraNam    sammAnitAsura sura bhUsura sAnurAga vaibhava hamsa gIrvANi rAga bhAv nAda svarAvaLi vibhava 
nanda nandana rAdhA candana ramaNIya guNArNAva lalita nayanala vadanEna krIta rAdhA mAnasa parAbhava
				(madhyamakAlam)
vamshIrava kAnana sakala bhuvana samsEvana pAlana ratikhElana 
kamsa vamsha dvamshana muniranjana samsAra ghOra bhaya bhanjana
	(repeat line starting with tAhata dInuta in the anupallavi)
